tokenDescription: Marvels Heroes is a superhero-themed, community-driven DeFi token. It combines the powers of iconic heroes with blockchain technology. Each transaction empowers holders through Reflection, LP Acquisition, and a unique Super Burn mechanism.
tokenCalltoActionText: Unite with the Marvels Heroes! $MVLS is here to revolutionize DeFi with the power of superheroes. Be part of our mission to save the crypto world! 🦸‍♂️🦸‍♀️ #MarvelsHeroes #MVLS 🚀
tokenDisclaimer: Marvels Heroes ($MVLS) is a fun homage to the superheroes we've all grown to love. This token is for entertainment purposes and carries no intrinsic value nor promises financial returns. Engage at your own risk, for the love of comics!
